IRPact_modellierung.agents.companyAgents.advertisement

Class AdvertisementScheme

  • java.lang.Object
    • IRPact_modellierung.agents.companyAgents.advertisement.AdvertisementScheme
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultAdvertisementScheme, EmptyAdvertisementScheme, UniformAdvertisementScheme

    public abstract class AdvertisementScheme
extends java.lang.Object
    The advertisement scheme formalizes the promotive processes the company agent engages in in order to promote the products in their portfolio. An advertisement scheme should specify what products are evaluated on the market in which way, and what measures are taken in order to promote these products.

    • Method Detail

      • advertiseProductPortfolio

        public abstract void advertiseProductPortfolio(CompanyAgent correspondingAgent)
        This method specifies the process the promotion of the product portfolio underlies. It is generally invoked by the process model and should include a market evaluation of the products, as well as practical promotive measures for the advertisement of these products.
        Parameters:
        correspondingAgent - The company agent managing the products in its portfolio
